quizDescription.text:
Note:write down the option as answer. If there are multiple correct options write down them as comma space separated
Eg: c
Eg: a, d

questionText.text:
Which of the following is a input validation concern
a. Centralize input validation routine
b. Specify proper character set
c. Validate for data range
d. All of the above

static and dynamic analysis tools are used to detect and eliminate software flaws.
a. True
b. False

Which of the following is not a typical characteristic of a ethical hacker
a. Having knowledge on widows
b. Know the process of exploiting a network vulnerabilities
c. Patience, persistence and perseverance
d. Has the highest level of security for the organisation

What is the most important activity in system hacking?
a. Information gathering
b. Cracking password
c. Escalating privileges
d. Covering tracks

Phishing is a form of __________
a. Spamming
b. Identity theft
c. Scanning
d. Impersonation
